sentences.en: As a matter of routine, the sheriff's office there had been notified of the change of address.
sentences.cn: 按照惯例, 他们已把地址变更的消息通知了那里的郡长办公室.

sentences.en: Goodwin comes in and tells her to contact the local sheriff.
sentences.cn: 古德温进屋来叫她去与当地县长取得联系.

sentences.en: He took me out to the county fair to see the county sheriff, whose support Ron said we had to have to carry the county.
sentences.cn: 他带我到县里的集会上去见县治安官，他说如果我们要想在这个县里赢得选举，就一定得去见他。

sentences.en: He was appointed Sheriff of New York.
sentences.cn: 他被任命为纽约司法长官.

sentences.en: He was elected sheriff of the county.
Oh, is it? … said the sheriff with a sneer.
sentences.cn: “噢, 是 吗 ?”司法官冷笑着说.

sentences.en: Or have him evicted by the sheriff.
sentences.cn: 要么由司法官把他从这儿赶出去.

sentences.en: She started violently forward, but the sheriff's arm checked her.
sentences.cn: 她猛然冲上前去, 但是执法官用手臂拦住了她.

sentences.en: The county sheriff is working with the FBI and our own city police.
sentences.cn: 县警察局长同联邦调查局和本市的警察一起干.

sentences.en: The criminal was fingerprinted in the sheriff's office.
sentences.cn: 罪犯在警长办公室里被取下指纹.

sentences.en: The crowd fell apart , now , and the Sheriff came through , ostentatiously leading Potter by the arm.
sentences.cn: 人群闪开, 让出了一条路.司法官揪着波特的胳膊,炫耀似地走过来.

sentences.en: The new sheriff decided to enforce the law with rigour.
The right wrist of the sheriff was all but dislocated.
sentences.cn: 郡长的右腕差一点脱了臼.

sentences.en: The sheriff ordered the suspicious looking stranger to hit the trail.
sentences.cn: 警察局长命令样子可疑的陌生人马上走.

sentences.en: The sheriff was already out of the saddle and into the telegraph office.
sentences.cn: 那郡长已经下了马,走进电报室去了.

sentences.en: They implored the sheriff to stay and protect them.
sentences.cn: 他恳求司法长官留下来保护他们.

words.tran_cn: （郡司法长官，郡治安官，警察局长之）辖区；职务

trans.tran_en: the representative of the king or queen in a county of England and Wales, who has mostly ceremonial duties
